version.author: guonaudio
version.changelog: Add support for special markers e.g. $marker(key) Fix $lufs, $rms, and $peak to only follow item extents (before it followed the entire source extents) Match require case to path case for Unix systems Limit scroll wheel tooltip for specialRegions Markers and Regions to unique keys, and clamp Track X to 0 when no Items selected

version.author: guonaudio
version.changelog: Remove os lib (refactored into global) Added "recent" list to allow recalling recently used strings
